title: Panasonic
description: The brand colors for Panasonic comprise a vibrant blue (#0041C0), classic black (#000000), and pristine white (#FFFFFF). These colors are officially recognized and sourced from Panasonic's industrial style guide, available at https://pages.na.industrial.panasonic.com/rs/173-ONW-167/images/PIDSA-StyleGuide-Brand-Portal-1.21.pdf.
